alert.note: Alert for Somerset; Wicomico (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 25 at 7:24PM EDT until July 25 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM EDT FOR SOMERSET...WICOMICO AND WESTERN WORCESTER COUNTIES... At 724 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Fruitland, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of Somerset, Wicomico and western Worcester Counties, including the following locations... Wetipquin, Trinity, Cokesbury, Goodwill, Eden, Kingston, Saxis, Shelltown, Longridge and Mount Vernon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
